tour.name: New Sculptures
tour.desc: Tour our new artwork that was installed in August 2017 in our rotating exhibit titled “New Sculptures.” The sculptures will be in Lake Oswego for two years from the date of installation, and all are for sale. For more information about the sculptures, the program, or the Arts Council of Lake Oswego please visit our website.

tour.name: Highlights of the Gallery Without Walls
tour.desc: With thirty rotating works of art in the Gallery Without Walls along with forty five sculptures in the Permanent collection it is difficult, if not impossible, to choose highlights of the collection. However, there are some that children and adults alike gravitate towards. They are representational and abstract, thought provoking and straight forward, large and small. These are some favorites.

tour.name: Abstract
tour.desc: Abstract art is often the most difficult art form for people to appreciate because it does not represent recognizable reality. So prepare to tease your eyes with art that uses shapes, colors, forms and textures as its subject matter.

tour.name: Animals
tour.desc: Animals have been depicted in art since ancient times - as symbols of gods, as beast of burden, and as comforting companions. Whether realistic or abstract, you will recognize all of them; so come and meet our whimsical and playful animals. The animals in our collect are guaranteed to delight children and the young at heart.

tour.name: At the Village
tour.desc: Do you only have a few minutes while waiting for a dinner reservation? Take a stroll into Millennium Plaza Park or along 1st Street for some sculptural surprises.

tour.name: Along A Avenue
tour.desc: Sculptors can express themselves in a variety of different artistic styles - abstract, realistic, or representational. Study these sculptures as you stroll along A Avenue and compare the diversity of self-expression.

tour.name: Bronze, Glass, Steel, Stone & Wood
tour.desc: The materials sculptors use in their work are as much an expression of the artist as the subjects they choose.

tour.name: Permanent Collection
tour.desc: Many sculptures in the city's permanent collection are dispersed throughout the city - in parks, in front of public buildings and in areas not easily accessible on a walking tour. Enjoy discovering these pieces of art and create your own tour.
